name: A future for microgeneration?
description: Cuts in the feed tariff, poor take up of the renewable heat incentive and questionable payback for micro-generation technologies under the Green Deal means the boom is over. What is the future for micro-generation?

speakers.name: Jeremy Leggett
speakers.occupation: Author, The Carbon War and Half Gone; Founder and Chairman, Solarcentury and SolarAid; and Chairman, CarbonTracker

speakers.name: Dave Sowden
speakers.occupation: Chief Executive, Micropower Council, and Secretary General, Micropower Europe

speakers.name: Minister from Department of Energy and Climate Change (DECC)
